job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Title: Site Reliability Engineer
Location: Beaverton, Oregon (97008) / Remote Option
Employment Type: Direct Hire (no c2c or sponsorship available)
EdgeLink is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to join an expanding team focused on connecting business to cloud applications and environments. From a skills perspective we are targeting most of the following:
Edgelink would like to thank all applicants, however only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted.
EdgeLink is an equal opportunity employer.
Job Requirements
SRE, DevOps, Site Reliability, CI/CD, Cloud, Azure, AWS, Linux, Bamboo, Puppet, Terraform, Unix, Networking, Tunneling, SQL, Database, Algorithm, Data Structure, VPN
